languages.text: "Во время одного рейда мы попали в западню, потому что Эммерсон продался преступному синдикату и предал нас".
"We ran into an ambush during a raid, all because Emmerson sold us out to a crime syndicate."
languages.original_text: "Во время одного рейда мы попали в западню, потому что Эммерсон продался преступному синдикату и предал нас".

traits.locale_text: "We ran into an ambush during a raid, all because Emmerson sold us out to a crime syndicate."
"We ran into an ambush during a raid, all because Emmerson sold us out to a crime syndicate."

"We ran into an ambush during a raid, all because Emmerson sold us out to a crime syndicate."

languages.text: 「襲撃中に待ち伏せを受けました。すべては、エマーソンが私たちを犯罪シンジケートに売ったせいです」
languages.original_text: "We ran into an ambush during a raid, all because Emmerson sold us out to a crime syndicate."

traits.locale_text: 「襲撃中に待ち伏せを受けました。すべては、エマーソンが私たちを犯罪シンジケートに売ったせいです」

languages.text: "Wir gerieten bei dem Angriff in einen Hinterhalt, weil Emmerson uns an ein Verbrechersyndikat verraten hatte."
languages.original_text: "We ran into an ambush during a raid, all because Emmerson sold us out to a crime syndicate."

traits.locale_text: "Wir gerieten bei dem Angriff in einen Hinterhalt, weil Emmerson uns an ein Verbrechersyndikat verraten hatte."

languages.text: « Nous avons subi une embuscade durant un raid, tout cela parce qu'Emmerson nous avait vendus à un syndicat criminel. »
languages.original_text: "We ran into an ambush during a raid, all because Emmerson sold us out to a crime syndicate."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons subi une embuscade durant un raid, tout cela parce qu'Emmerson nous avait vendus à un syndicat criminel. »

languages.text: «Caímos en una emboscada durante una redada, y todo porque Emmerson nos vendió a un sindicato del crimen».
languages.original_text: "We ran into an ambush during a raid, all because Emmerson sold us out to a crime syndicate."

traits.locale_text: «Caímos en una emboscada durante una redada, y todo porque Emmerson nos vendió a un sindicato del crimen».

languages.text: “在某次行动中，我们遭到了伏击。这一切都是因为艾莫森把我们的情报卖给了犯罪集团。”
languages.original_text: "We ran into an ambush during a raid, all because Emmerson sold us out to a crime syndicate."

traits.locale_text: “在某次行动中，我们遭到了伏击。这一切都是因为艾莫森把我们的情报卖给了犯罪集团。”

languages.text: "Bir baskın sırasında pusuya düşürüldük çünkü Emmerson bizi bir suç şebekesine satmıştı."
languages.original_text: "We ran into an ambush during a raid, all because Emmerson sold us out to a crime syndicate."
